info.name: PT-2 Direct API
info.description:
PayTabs-PT2 Direct APIs

The official PayTabs API postman collection

Getting Started

In order to use the below API you need to have a PayTabs account. You can sign up for a free accounthere.

Once you complete sign up and Log in to you PayTabs dashboard, Go to Developers page > Key management, where you can find the profile id and server key using in this collection.

Target Audience

This document is intended for software engineers who needs to integrate a payment gateway for online payment acceptance

Assistance

If you require assistance, please email us at cs@paytabs.com

Documentation

For further documentation, you can find all technical documentation once yousign upto PayTabs account, in Developers Section.

Integration Solutions

  1. eCommerce Plugins: Shopify, Magento, WooCommerce, OpenCart, CSCart, Xero, Zoho, Expand Cart, Zid, Salla

  2. Mobile SDK: Android, IOS, React, Flutter

  3. API Integrations: PayTabs Hosted Payment Page, Managed Form, Merchant Own form

Available Services

  • Authorization and capture

  • eCommerce, MoTo, Recurring

  • Invoicing

  • Payment Notification (Callback service, Instant Payment Notifications)

  • Customer emails receipts (Send Grid)

Payment Methods

  1. Credit Cards: Visa, MasterCard, American express, UnionPay

  2. Debit Cards: mada (KSA), meeza (Egypt), Omannet(Oman), Knet (Kuwait)

  3. Mobile Wallets: STCpay (KSA), Meeza Wallets (Egypt), Apple pay, Samsung pay

  4. BuyNow, Pay Later: valU (Egypt)

  5. Cash: Aman (Egypt)
If the below tag is passed in the request for hosted payment page the relevant payment method is displayed if enabled for the merchant else all the applicable payment methods are displayed on the payment page.

"payment_methods": ["card","applepay"]

Payment Method

Description

card

Credit Card payment method

creditcard

Credit Card payment method

mada

MADA payment method in KSA

amex

AMEX payment method

unionpay

Union Pay payment method

stcpay

STC Pay payment method in KSA

valu

ValU payment method in Egypt

meeza

Meeza payment method in Egypt

meezaqr

Meeza QR payment method in Egypt

omannet

Omannet payment method in Oman

knet

KNET payment method

applepay

Apple pay payment method

samsungpay

Samsung Pay payment method

aman

Aman Payment method in Egypt

Testing

Test Cards can be found in PayTabs merchant dashboard > Developers > Testing > API debug log

Debugging

To help you troubleshoot your integration, API Debug logs can be found in PayTabs merchant dashboard > Developers > Testing > API debug log

Invalid return url | | 209 | E | Invalid merchant token | | 211 | E | Profile mismatch | | 212 | E | Permission Denied | | 213 | D | Card does not match filter | | 214 | E | Terminal invalid request | | 215 | E | Terminal unable to process request | | 216 | E | Invalid refund mode | | 300 | D | Not authorised | | 301 | D | Card expiry date required | | 302 | D | Card expired/ incorrect expiry date Card security code (CVV) and address (AVS) mismatch | | 308 | D | Card is not enabled for e-commerce | | 309 | D | 3DSecure authentication not available for this card | | 310 | D | 3DSecure authentication rejected | | 311 | D | Card cancelled | | 312 | D | No/invalid account | | 313 | D | Transaction not permitted by issuer | | 314 | D | Not authorised | | 315 | D | Not authorised | | 316 | D | Insufficient funds | | 317 | D | Blocked by acquirer | | 318 | X | Authorisation expired | | 319 | D | Unable to void | | 320 | D | Unable to refund | | 321 | C | Cancelled | | 322 | D | Not supported by acquirer | | 323 | D | Card limits exceeded | | 324 | D | Terminal limits exceeded | | 325 | D | Merchant limits exceeded | | 326 | D | Account limits exceeded | | 327 | D | OTP timeout | | 328 | D | Refund request not approved | | 329 | D | Declined by card issuer | | 330 | D | Unable to capture | | 331 | D | Minimum financed amount violation | | 332 | D | Wallet customer not found | | 333 | D | OTP is invalid | | 334 | D | Unable to retrieve details from processor | | 335 | D | Transaction type not supported by acquirer | | 336 | D | Trading suspended | | 337 | D | Refund declined by acquirer | | 338 | D | Authentication not available | | 339 | D | OTP attempts exceeded | | 340 | D | Not registered for OTP | | 341 | D | Transaction time exceeded | | 342 | D | Refund balance exceeded | | 343 | D | Declined by acquirer | | 344 | D | Acquirer is unable to process this request | | 345 | D | 3DSecure authentication not completed | | 346 | D | Issuer unable to process 3DSecure | | 347 | D | Incorrect PIN | | 348 | D | Allowable PIN tries exceeded | | 349 | E | Invalid merchant account | | 350 | D | Invalid tenure | | 351 | D | Invalid downpayment | | 400 | E | Internal system error | | 401 | E | No response | | 402 | E | Error connecting to service provider | | 500 | D | Declined | | 501 | D | Declined | | 502 | D | Declined | | 503 | D | Declined | | 504 | D | Declined | | 600 | P | Pending | | 601 | H | On Hold |

Hosted Payment Page UI Customization

Hosted Payment Page can be fully customized from PayTabs Merchant Dashboard > Developers > Paypage Settings, you can apply any of the following controls to match the hosted payment page UI with your websites theme:

  • Logo Image (Upload Image Logo)

  • Header Image (Upload Header Image)

  • Disable Merchant Name: Yes/No( Hide Merchant name under the Merchant logo )

  • Header Image Repeat: Yes/No

  • Header Image Position: (Left/Center/Right)

  • Header background color

  • Page background color

  • Page background grey transparent: (Y/N)

  • PayButton Background color

  • PayButton Hover color

  • PayButton Text color

Hide Billing/Shipping details

To hide billing and shipping details, refer to the Post request sample in this collection (Create payment page - Hide billing & shipping)

Framed Option

You can load the payment page in a frame on your checkout page avoiding the redirection of your customers to a new page, refer to the Post request sample in this collection (Create payment page â€“ Framed)

Transaction API

The main transaction request API is used to process all payments, regardless of if they are through either your own payment pages, the managed payment pages, or if your are using the hosted payment pages.

All requests are made using server-to-server calls, with JSON format data.

The transaction request API must not be used from within a browser.

All requests must be sent using HTTP POST to the PayTabs transaction API endpoint

Authorization Header

You will need your server key in order to make any of the API requests in this collection. This is not the same as the client key that is used within the managed payment pages. Authentication is done by including your server key in the 'Authorization:' header for the request.

(Authorization Type: API key)

Server key is available in your PayTabs Merchant Dashboard > Developers Section > Key Management

item.name: Hosted Payment Page

request.description: Create a Payment page for Hosted Payment Page Integration.

body.raw:
{
    "profile_id": {{profile_id}},
    "tran_type": "sale",
    "tran_class": "ecom",
    "cart_id": "cart_555",
    "cart_currency": "{{currency}}",
    "cart_amount": 9.5,
    "cart_description": "Description of the items/services",
    "customer_details": {
        "name": "{{customer_name}}",
        "email": "email@domain.com",
        "phone": "{{customer_phone}}",
        "country": "{{customer_country}}",
        "state": "{{customer_state}}",
        "city": "{{customer_city}}",
        "street1": "address street",
        "zip": "12345"
    },
    "hide_shipping": true,
    "callback": "{{callback_url}}",
    "return": "{{return_url}}",
    "customer_ref": "customer_ref-1",
    "invoice": {
        "shipping_charges": 0,
        "extra_charges": 0,
        "extra_discount": 0,
        "total": 9.5,
        "line_items": [
            {
                "sku": "sku",
                "description": "invoice item",
                "url": "https://paytabs.com",
                "unit_cost": 9.5,
                "quantity": 1,
                "net_total": 9.5,
                "discount_rate": 0,
                "discount_amount": 0,
                "tax_rate": 0,
                "tax_total": 0,
                "total": 9.5
            }
        ]
    }
}

request.description: Create a Payment page for Hosted Payment Page Integration.

item.name: Create Payment Page - With Card Discounts Amount

body.raw:
{
    "profile_id": {{profile_id}},
    "tran_type": "sale",
    "tran_class": "ecom",
    "cart_id": "cart_11111",
    "cart_currency": "{{currency}}",
    "cart_amount": 40,
    "cart_description": "Description of the items/services",
    "paypage_lang": "en",
    "customer_details": {
        "name": "{{customer_name}}",
        "email": "email@domain.com",
        "phone": "{{customer_phone}}",
        "country": "{{customer_country}}",
        "state": "{{customer_state}}",
        "city": "{{customer_city}}",
        "street1": "address street",
        "zip": "12345"
    },
    "hide_shipping": true,
    "callback": "{{callback_url}}",
    "return": "{{return_url}}",
    "card_discounts": [
        {
            "discount_cards": "4111,5200",
            "discount_amount": 30,
            "discount_title": "30 {{currency}} discount on cards start with 4111,5200"
        },
        {
            "discount_cards": "4000",
            "discount_amount": "2.5",
            "discount_title": "25 {{currency}} discount on cards start with 4000"
        }
    ]
}

request.description: Create a Payment page for Hosted Payment Page Integration with Card Discounts. card_discount array can have multiple discounts based on card ranges. card_discounts array will have the following fields: discount_cards: BIN ranges, It could be applied for cards starting with the numbers mentioned in this field. This will be comma separated fields. discount_amount: Flat discount amount that will be applied when the discount card BIN ranges are matched discount_title: Title that will be displayed on the payment page for the cardholder/ customer.

        }

}

request.description:
Create a Payment page for Hosted Payment Page Integration with Card Discounts.

card_discount array can have multiple discounts based on card ranges.

card_discounts array will have the following fields:

_discount_cards: BIN ranges, It could be applied for cards starting with the numbers mentioned in this field. This will be comma separated fields._

_discount_amount: Flat discount amount that will be applied when the discount card BIN ranges are matched._

_discount_percent: Discount Percent that will be applied when the discount card BIN ranges are matched._

_discount_title: Title that will be displayed on the payment page for the cardholder/ customer._

request.description: Create a Payment page for Hosted Payment Page Integration.

item.description:
Hosted Payment Page - Merchants with PCI SAQ A or do not have any PCI levels.


*tran_type*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| sale      | Purchase Transaction|
| auth      | Transaction in auth and capture mode|
| capture| Capturing authorized transaction|
| void| Voiding authorized transaction|
| refund | Refund Transaction of fully captured transaction|

*tran_class*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| ecom      | ECommerce Online Transaction|
| moto      | Mail Order Telephonic Order Transaction|
| recurring| Recurring token based transaction|

*tokenise*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| 2      | Hex32     |
| 3      | AlphaNum20|
| 4      | Digit22     |
| 5      | Digit16|
| 6      | AlphaNum32|

item.name: Hosted Payment Page - with payment methods

request.description: Create a Payment page for Hosted Payment Page Integration.

body.raw:
{
    "profile_id": {{profile_id}},
    "tran_type": "sale",
    "tran_class": "ecom",
    "payment_methods": [
        "paypal"
    ],

item.description:
Hosted Payment Page - Merchants with PCI SAQ A or do not have any PCI levels.


*tran_type*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| sale      | Purchase Transaction|
| auth      | Transaction in auth and capture mode|
| capture| Capturing authorized transaction|
| void| Voiding authorized transaction|
| refund | Refund Transaction of fully captured transaction|

*tran_class*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| ecom      | ECommerce Online Transaction|
| moto      | Mail Order Telephonic Order Transaction|
| recurring| Recurring token based transaction|

*tokenise*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| 2      | Hex32     |
| 3      | AlphaNum20|
| 4      | Digit22     |
| 5      | Digit16|
| 6      | AlphaNum32|

item.name: Token based transactions

request.description: The request is for Merchant Initiated Recurring payment without cardholder involvement.

item.name: Create customer initiated token based payment
Create customer initiated token based payment (new format)

item.description:
Sale or Authorization initiated with a token.

Note1: This requires acquirer to enable tokenization and continuous authorization on their end.

Note2: You need to send request and share your profile ID to cs@paytabs.com to enable recurring option for your profile.


*tran_type*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| sale      | Purchase Transaction|
| auth      | Transaction in auth and capture mode|
| capture| Capturing authorized transaction|
| void| Voiding authorized transaction|
| refund | Refund Transaction of fully captured transaction|

*tran_class*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| ecom      | ECommerce Online Transaction|
| moto      | Mail Order Telephonic Order Transaction|
| recurring| Recurring token based transaction|

*tokenise*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| 2      | Hex32     |
| 3      | AlphaNum20|
| 4      | Digit22     |
| 5      | Digit16|
| 6      | AlphaNum32|

item.description:
Merchants with minimum of PCI SAQ A-EP will be able to use the managed form mode of integration.

**Tag Values**

*tran_type*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| sale      | Purchase Transaction|
| auth      | Transaction in auth and capture mode|
| capture| Capturing authorized transaction|
| void| Voiding authorized transaction|
| refund | Refund Transaction of fully captured transaction|

*tran_class*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| ecom      | ECommerce Online Transaction|
| moto      | Mail Order Telephonic Order Transaction|
| recurring| Recurring token based transaction|

*tokenise*

| Value  | Format |
| ------------- |:-------------:|
| 2      | Hex32     |
| 3      | AlphaNum20|
| 4      | Digit22     |
| 5      | Digit16|
| 6      | AlphaNum32|
